metadata.title: YouTube Content Repurposing 2025: Maximize Every Video

hero.headline: YouTube Content Repurposing Guide
hero.subheadline: One video, many platforms. Maximize your content investment.

sections.content: Content repurposing extracts maximum value from every video you create. A single long-form video can become Shorts, social posts, blog content, podcasts, and more. Smart repurposing expands reach without proportionally increasing work.

faq.question: Does repurposing hurt original video?
faq.answer: No—different platforms, different audiences. Clips can drive traffic to long-form. YouTube doesn't penalize for having content elsewhere.

faq.question: How many Shorts from one video?
faq.answer: Depends on content length. 10-20 minute video might yield 3-5 good Shorts. Don't force it—only clip genuinely strong moments.

faq.question: Should I post same clip everywhere?
faq.answer: Mostly yes. Each platform has different audience. Adjust aspect ratio and captions for platform conventions. Same content, platform-optimized.

faq.question: Best tool for clip creation?
faq.answer: CapCut, Opus Clip (AI-based), or manual editing in your NLE. AI tools speed up but miss context. Manual gives more control.
